name: HexSplat
description:
Hexagons are being taken. Create your own artistic works through battles with your red arch nemesis.

Hex Splat is a singleplayer  shooter game where the only way to defeat the enemy is to overpower him. Cover all sorts of maps with your blue paint and keep them in your in game gallery.  Picasso would be really proud of you!

- The controls -

W to move up.

A to move left

S to move down

D to move right

Left Mouse Button to shoot

- Dev Note -

Hey! Thanks for playing or viewing my game. This is a very short game I made for Procjam 2020. I hope you enjoyed the game. :D
